description: A Node.js command-line application. It takes in information about employees on a software engineering team, then generate an HTML webpage that displays summaries for each person.
title: Team-Profile-Generator

description: This is an app that generated a professional Github README file for any project. It will take user's input and create a quality README file with sections like: title, description, license, installation, usage, testing, and questions.
title: Readme Generator

description: Forcast app using OpenWeather API. The App allows the user to enter a city name & display the weather forecast for today and the next 5 days.
title: Weather Forecast App

description: A simple daily planner App, that colour codes  each timeblock based on past, present, and future when the timeblock is viewed. You can add your task to each timeblock by simply clicking on it.
title: Daily Planner App

description: A simple, timed coding quiz with multiple-choice questions. Once the user has finished the quiz (or the time is over) the user can save their initials and score to a high scores table..
title: Code Quiz
